name: BearWALK: The Game
description:
“The year is 2020 in an alternate universe.  Covid-19 has caused a worldwide pandemic, but in this universe, the virus transforms people into zombie-like creatures.  UC Berkeley is on the brink of discovering a vaccine, but at the last moment, the zombie-like creatures have overtaken the campus, scattering its researchers, data, and students. All seems to be lost, until UC Berkeley launches its last resort: BearWALK.  Its mission? Rescue all the researchers and data in order to complete the vaccine.”

Controls:

WASD to move, Q to interact, SPACE for speed boost, E for pepper spray, F to vent

Credits:

Yohan Yan - Lead Programmer

Sherry Chen - Programmer

Shinyen Chiu - Lead Artist
